column4: I had the grainy font problem before with my nvidia but I can't recall what I did to fix it, good news is it is fixed so you do have hope

it's something like a setting for cleartype System > Preferences > Fonts > Rendering and Details...  It is the "ClearType" settings for Gnome, the default for which was not right for my monitor.  also look for anti aliasing
I'm using xfce and I think I found it. Thanks!
